''These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web,'' he said.

A star in Atlanta for most of his six seasons as a Falcon after being selected first overall in the 2001 draft, Michael Vick missed 2007 and 2008 while incarcerated for 18 months in a federal prison.
